segments.text: It's the 17th week now , isn't it ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , the final exam is coming soon . I feel a little bit nervous .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Take it easy . There is still one more week left before the exam begins . Have you prepared for it well ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , I haven't began my preparations .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Then shall we make preparations together ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Great . You can help me a lot with English .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: All right . But I am very poor at math . Would you like to help me with my math ?
segments.speaker: S2
